mobileResponsivenessTip: Optimize images and use responsive design for better mobile viewing.
loadingSpeedTip: Reduce image sizes and minify JavaScript to improve loading times.
seoOptimizationTip: Improve on-page SEO by adding more keywords, alt text for images, and optimizing meta tags.
userExperienceTip: Improve navigation with clearer calls-to-action and less cluttered content.
bookingFlowTip: Streamline the booking process by reducing unnecessary form fields and steps.
tips: Improve mobile responsiveness by ensuring the site adapts smoothly on different screen sizes.
Optimize page speed by implementing caching and reducing the number of HTTP requests.
Enhance SEO by improving on-page content and keyword targeting.
